page.title: 19LEISURE:Tennis Tournament.
page.content: Faiseat held their annual tennis tournament on Saturday,July 27th.This event has been taking place for the last twenty five years.Recently,it has grown in importance and now some two hundred competitors take part each year.These competitors play by invitation only.With such a large number taking part it is now impossible to play all the matches in Fairseat.The early rounds are played at a number of locations.In fact there are now eighteen centres in all.Most of these are tennis courts that are attached to private houses in the area.There are centres at Ightam,The McMillan Centre,Fairseat House,Wrotham Rec,Trottiscliffe and elsewhere.The main centre is at Court House in Fairseat.This is where all the important matches are played and prizes presented.
